pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LinkedIn Messaging API[![Python](https://github.com/sumnerevans/linkedin-messaging-api/actions/workflows/python.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/sumnerevans/linkedin-messaging-api/actions/workflows/python.yaml)[![Matrix Chat](https://img.shields.io/matrix/linkedin-matrix:nevarro.space?server_fqdn=matrix.nevarro.space)](https://matrix.to/#/#linkedin-matrix:nevarro.space?via=nevarro.space&via=sumnerevans.com)An unofficial API for interacting with LinkedIn Messaging.Built using [aiohttp](https://docs.aiohttp.org/en/stable/).## DocumentationSee [`examples` directory](./examples).## CreditsInspired by [linkedin-api](https://github.com/tomquirk/linkedin-api).Authentication technique from [@everping](https://github.com/everping) in the[Linkedin-Authentication-Challenge](https://github.com/everping/Linkedin-Authentication-Challenge)repo. Used with permission.
